price: Aheman a εwͻ hͻ daa a, Ahummͻborͻ Hene no ahyε Nenkoa no ho bͻ a εwͻ kokoa mu no (emu na wͻ’bεtena). Nokorε sε Onyankopͻn bͻhyε bεyε hͻ.
arabic: جَنَّٰتِ عَدۡنٍ ٱلَّتِي وَعَدَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ عِبَادَهُۥ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَأۡتِيّٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: jannāti ʿadnin allatī waʿada al-raḥmānu ʿibādahu bil-ghaybi innahu kāna waʿduhu matiyyan
